mapper.select: select EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID, NAME, EMPLOYEE_GROUP, SUB_GROUP1, SUB_GROUP2, UNIT, OFFICE_LOCATION, CONTACT, THIS_WEEK_ON_DUTY, NEXT_WEEK_ON_DUTY, REMARKS from EMPLOYEE_DUTY where EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID = #{employeeDutyID}
mapper.insert: insert into EMPLOYEE_DUTY(NAME, EMPLOYEE_GROUP, SUB_GROUP1, SUB_GROUP2, UNIT, OFFICE_LOCATION, CONTACT, THIS_WEEK_ON_DUTY, NEXT_WEEK_ON_DUTY, REMARKS) values (#{name}, #{employeeGroup}, #{subGroup1}, #{subGroup2}, #{unit}, #{officeLocation}, #{contact}, #{thisWeekOnDuty}, #{nextWeekOnDuty}, #{remarks})

insert into EMPLOYEE_DUTY(EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID,NAME,EMPLOYEE_GROUP,SUB_GROUP1,SUB_GROUP2,UNIT,OFFICE_LOCATION,CONTACT,THIS_WEEK_ON_DUTY,NEXT_WEEK_ON_DUTY,REMARKS) values
(#{entity.employeeDutyID},#{entity.name},#{entity.employeeGroup},#{entity.subGroup1},#{entity.subGroup2},#{entity.unit},#{entity.officeLocation},#{entity.contact},#{entity.thisWeekOnDuty},#{entity.nextWeekOnDuty},#{entity.remarks})
on duplicate key update EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID=values(EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID), NAME=values(NAME), EMPLOYEE_GROUP=values(EMPLOYEE_GROUP), SUB_GROUP1=values(SUB_GROUP1), SUB_GROUP2=values(SUB_GROUP2), UNIT=values(UNIT), OFFICE_LOCATION=values(OFFICE_LOCATION), CONTACT=values(CONTACT), THIS_WEEK_ON_DUTY=values(THIS_WEEK_ON_DUTY), NEXT_WEEK_ON_DUTY=values(NEXT_WEEK_ON_DUTY), REMARKS=values(REMARKS)
mapper.update:
update EMPLOYEE_DUTY
EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID = #{employeeDutyID},
NAME = #{name},
EMPLOYEE_GROUP = #{employeeGroup},
SUB_GROUP1 = #{subGroup1},
SUB_GROUP2 = #{subGroup2},
UNIT = #{unit},
OFFICE_LOCATION = #{officeLocation},
CONTACT = #{contact},
THIS_WEEK_ON_DUTY = #{thisWeekOnDuty},
NEXT_WEEK_ON_DUTY = #{nextWeekOnDuty},
REMARKS = #{remarks},
where EMPLOYEE_DUTY_ID = #{employeeDutyID}
